enable-deltarune.name: Enable Deltarune
enable-deltarune.description: Disable if ur boring as hell

tab-character.name: Deltarune - Tab Character
tab-character.description: The character to use in the Deltarune styled tab. Doesn't affect HP values, everyone has max 100 and everyone will take fully random damage

cond-ic-randomizer.name: Enable Conditional Icon Randomizer
cond-ic-randomizer.description: Enables the Conditional Icon Randomizer - An icon randomizer mode that only gets activated on specific conditions, configured below.

cond-ongamemodechange.name: Conditional - On Gamemode Change
cond-ongamemodechange.description: Enables randomizing icons on each gamemode change in-level.

cond-ondeath.name: Conditional - On Death/Reset
cond-ondeath.description: Enables randomizing icons on each death.

cond-onclick.name: Conditional - On Click
cond-onclick.description: Enables randomizing icons on each click in-level.

live-ic-randomizer.name: Enable Live Icon Randomizer
live-ic-randomizer.description: Enables the Live Icon Randomizer - An icon randomizer mode that randomizes icons each X amount of time, configured below.

random-delay.name: Randomize Delay
random-delay.description: Defines how long to wait in-between each icon randomization.

randomize-color1.name: Randomize Color 1
randomize-color1.description: Randomize the first color of the icon.

randomize-color2.name: Randomize Color 2
randomize-color2.description: Randomize the second color of the icon.

randomize-glowcolor.name: Randomize Glow Color
randomize-glowcolor.description: Randomize the glow color of the icon.

rgbicons-title.name: RGB Icons
rgbicons-title.description: The chroma icons mod crashes whenever a fly passes by and megahack doesn't customize anything past the colors.

rgb-speed.name: RGB Cycle Speed
rgb-speed.description: How fast you want the RGB to cycle.

rgb-saturation.name: Saturation - Color 1
rgb-saturation.description: Saturation setting for Color 1's RGB mode.

rgb-saturation2.name: Saturation - Color 2
rgb-saturation2.description: Saturation setting for Color 2's RGB mode.

rgb-brightness1.name: Brightness - Color 1
rgb-brightness1.description: Brightness setting for Color 1's RGB mode.

rgb-brightness2.name: Brightness - Color 2
rgb-brightness2.description: Brightness setting for Color 2's RGB mode.

rgb-wave.name: RGB Wave
rgb-wave.description: Enables RGB for the Wave trail.

rgb-trail.name: RGB Trail
rgb-trail.description: Enables RGB for the normal trail.

rgb-dash.name: RGB Dash Fire
rgb-dash.description: Enables RGB for the Dash Fire.

better-immersion-mode.name: RGB Immersion Mode
better-immersion-mode.description: Enables the RGB effect to show on other particles, such as Ship and robot boost.

ignore-p2.name: Ignore Player 2
ignore-p2.description: Disables the RGB effect for Player 2.

p2-distance.name: Player 2 Distance
p2-distance.description: The HUE difference between Color 1 and Color 2. Higher values mean more distance.

trail-title.name: Legacy Trail
trail-title.description: The trail if it was still good.

use-legacytrail.name: Enable Legacy Trail
use-legacytrail.description: Enables the legacy trail function. This is the same as Eclipse, so if u have that disable this.

max-points.name: Trail: Max Points
max-points.description:
The maximum amount of points the trail can have. 
This feature is taken from Eclipse.

pulse-title.name: Legacy Pulse
pulse-title.description: The pulse if it was still good.

legacy-pulse.name: Enable Legacy Pulse
legacy-pulse.description:
Enable the legacy pulse. 
This feature is taken from Eclipse.

pulse-fps.name: Pulse: FPS
pulse-fps.description: The FPS the legacy pulse should emulate.

garage-select-anim.name: Garage: Icon Select Animation
garage-select-anim.description: Enables a small scaling animation + a sound when selecting icons in the Icon Kit.

ballrot-bug.name: Gameplay: Ball Rotation Bug
ballrot-bug.description:
Replicates the Ball Rotation Bug from older GD versions. 
This feature is taken from QOLMod.

iconlist-ft.name: Icon Listing Features
iconlist-ft.description:
Enables a set of buttons in the Icon Kit that allow you to create icon lists and export them to a file. ONLY WORKS WITH MOREICONS ICONS!!! 
Pretty niche feature only for myself.

icon-renderer.name: Icon Renderer
icon-renderer.description: Settings for the Icon Renderer feature, which allows you to render icons as .png images directly in-game.

enable-renderer.name: Renderer Features
enable-renderer.description: Enables the Icon Renderer Features on the Icon Kit.

renders-path.name: Renders Folder
renders-path.description: Where to save the Icon Renders to. Defaults to this mod's config directory.

bg-color.name: Render Background Color
bg-color.description: Defines the BG color to use for the renders. Defaults to transparent (which is best, honestly)

max-per-row.name: BATCH - Max Icons per Row
max-per-row.description: Defines the max amount of icons per row when rendering a batch of multiple icons.

noclip-totem.name: Totem of Undying animation
noclip-totem.description: Settings for the Totem animation when dying with noclip on.

enable-totem.name: Enable Totem Animation
enable-totem.description: Enable the totem animation when dying with noclip on.

totem-cooldown.name: Totem Cooldown
totem-cooldown.description: The cooldown for how often can the totem animation be played. Higher cooldown means less totem animations, even if you're constantly dying.

totem-scale.name: Totem Scale
totem-scale.description: The scale of the totem animation on screen. Higher scale means bigger totem. Around 2.7 mimics the size of the Vanilla animation.

icon-stuff-title.name: Full Icon Customization
icon-stuff-title.description: Full customization of player icon colors.

enable-customcolors.name: Enable Custom Colors
enable-customcolors.description: Enable custom colors for the icon.

tint-wave-p1.name: Tint Wave Trail
tint-wave-p1.description: Defines if the wave trail will be tinted or nah. Easier to make this an option LOLLLL

tint-wave-p2.name: Tint Wave Trail - P2
tint-wave-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's wave trail will be tinted a different color from Player 1's wave trail.

tint-trail-p1.name: Tint Trail
tint-trail-p1.description: Defines if the trail will be tinted or nah. Easier to make this an option LOLLLL

tint-trail-p2.name: Tint Trail - P2
tint-trail-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's trail will be tinted a different color from Player 1's trail.

tint-ghost-trail-p1.name: Tint Ghost Trail
tint-ghost-trail-p1.description: Defines if the ghost trail will be tinted a different color from the primary color.

tint-ghost-trail-p2.name: Tint Ghost Trail - P2
tint-ghost-trail-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's ghost trail will be tinted a different color from Player 1's ghost trail.

tint-dashfire-p1.name: Tint Dash Fire
tint-dashfire-p1.description: Defines if the dash fire will be tinted a different color from the primary color.

tint-dashfire-p2.name: Tint Dash Fire - P2
tint-dashfire-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's dash fire will be tinted a different color from Player 1's dash fire.

tint-ufodome-p1.name: Tint UFO Dome
tint-ufodome-p1.description: Defines if the UFO dome will be tinted a different color from the icon's primary color.

tint-ufodome-p2.name: Tint UFO Dome - P2
tint-ufodome-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's UFO dome will be tinted a different color from Player 1's UFO dome.

override-all-variances.name: Override All Variances
override-all-variances.description: Overrides all particle variances with the ones defined below. This will only apply to RGB variances, alpha variances will remain the same.

variances-override.name: Override Variances Color
variances-override.description: The value to use for all variances when 'Override All Variances' is enabled. This setting is an RGB color, the higher each channel is, the more variance there will be for that channel.

tint-mainparticles-p1.name: Tint Main Particles - P1
tint-mainparticles-p1.description: Defines if the main particles for Player 1 will be tinted a different color from the icon's primary color.

p1-main-particles-start.name: Main Particles StartColor - P1
p1-main-particles-start.description: The start color of the main particles.

p1-main-particles-end.name: Main Particles EndColor - P1
p1-main-particles-end.description: The end color of the main particles.

tint-mainparticles-p2.name: Tint Main Particles - P2
tint-mainparticles-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's main particles will be tinted a different color from Player 1's main particles.

p2-main-particles-start.name: Main Particles StartColor - P2
p2-main-particles-start.description: The start color of the main particles.

p2-main-particles-end.name: Main Particles EndColor - P2
p2-main-particles-end.description: The end color of the main particles.

tint-ufo-click-particles-p1.name: Tint UFO Click Particles
tint-ufo-click-particles-p1.description: Defines if the UFO click particles will be tinted a different color for Player 1.

p1-ufo-click-particles-start.name: UFO Click Particles StartColor - P1
p1-ufo-click-particles-start.description: The start color of the UFO click particles.

p1-ufo-click-particles-end.name: UFO Click Particles EndColor - P1
p1-ufo-click-particles-end.description: The end color of the UFO click particles.

tint-ufo-click-particles-p2.name: Tint UFO Click Particles - P2
tint-ufo-click-particles-p2.description: Defines if Player 2's UFO click particles will be tinted a different color from Player 1's UFO click particles.

p2-ufo-click-particles-start.name: UFO Click Particles StartColor - P2
p2-ufo-click-particles-start.description: The start color of the UFO click particles.

p2-ufo-click-particles-end.name: UFO Click Particles EndColor - P2
p2-ufo-click-particles-end.description: The end color of the UFO click particles.

name: Personal Tweaks
description: Personal tweaks i need for the game
